VPN.MU.summary: AS VEF Radiotehnika RRR produces and sells acoustic systems and their enclosures in Latvia and Italy. The company manufactures speaker cabinets and printed circuit boards; mounts printed circuit boards, including SMD assemblies; and assembles electronic parts and cable harnesses. Its products include active subwoofers, bookshelves, center channels, floor standings, and home theaters. The company also rents real estate properties. In addition, it exports its products. AS VEF Radiotehnika RRR was founded in 1927 and is based in Riga, Latvia.
